thread.title: Virginia Children's Festival canceled due to storm
thread.title_full: Virginia Children's Festival canceled due to storm

author: Mike Holtzclaw
title: Virginia Children's Festival canceled due to storm
text:
Virginia Children's Festival canceled due to storm Mike Holtzclaw 757-928-6479 | mholtzclaw@dailypress.com 
The Virginia Children's Festival has been canceled due to the anticipated bad weather this weekend, the promoter Norfolk Festevents announced on Thursday afternoon. 
The event, originally scheduled for Saturday in Town Point Park, had been moved indoors to the Scope arena. But now the festival has been canceled altogether "to ensure the safety of our guests and team members," the Festevents press release reports. 
It joins a growing list of cancellations for this weekend, including the Fall Festival of Friends in Newport News, the Crawlin' Crab weekend and the Chesapeake Bay Reggae Festival in Hampton, as well as Langley Speedway's "Day of Destruction," which has been postponed until Oct. 24. 
Keep checking back at dailypress.com for updates.
